name: places/ChIJIXHG-Cf2wokRpzapI5ug6Hc
formattedAddress: 711 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 711 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: Love them! I was nervous about going to a new salon in the city, but they were reasonably priced and so helpful. She took the time to talk with me and make sure my hair would look like I wanted as was super patient in suggesting her own ideas without changing my ideas too much. It looks good two months later. (I have short hair which grew out so well).

originalText.text: Lucy is a wonderful hairdresser. She has cut and permed my hair for the last 15 years. She is also a wonderful person! I highly recommend Lucy’s Hair Studio!!

text.text: Lucy is a wonderful hairdresser. She has cut and permed my hair for the last 15 years. She is also a wonderful person! I highly recommend Lucy’s Hair Studio!!

originalText.text:
UPDATE:  Today, I got another great hairstyle at Lucy's Hair Studio.  Initially, I wasn't sure about the style that I chose, since it was more edgy than I'm used to. But, when I got home, I noticed just how skillfully Lucy tailored the cut to flatter my face shape and now I'm just loving my new look!  I look fresh and up to date.  If you want your hair done by someone who knows her craft, you should definitely book your next hair appointment with Lucy, pronto.  She really knows her stuff. 11-14-18.
There is a reason why this is my third time back to Lucy's Hair Studio,  Lucy's talent.  I showed her a picture of how I wanted my hair to look and she duplicated the look perfectly.  Her assistant, Tati, is attentive, welcoming, friendly, and she really knows how to give a great shampoo.  They work so well together that the studio functions like a well oiled machine. I always feel well taken care of and listened to when I'm there.  I highly recommend this place to both women and men.

originalText.text: I've been going to Lucy for about a year, and I am delighted with her.  She gave me a graduated bob with blunt bangs, and I've received more compliments since Lucy's been cutting my hair than ever before in my life.  At the risk of being self-congratulatory, my hair looks great.  Lucy is lovely; she makes you feel right at home in her studio, and her staff is also warm and welcoming.  I've referred a number of friends b/c they've asked me where I go - she is that good.  Go - I promise you won't be sorry.

originalText.text: I trust Lucy completely!  She has a great eye and knows what will look good even when I'm unsure.  Her cuts always grow in really well and still look good 6, 8 months later.  I will keep going back to Lucy and I recommend her to my friends.  Plus, Lucy's the only stylist in the shop so it's not crowded.
